name: benchtest
description: Opinionated, serializable, integrated benchmarking and unit testing.

scripts.prepare: cp ./src/benchtest.js ./index.js && cp ./src/benchtest.js dist/benchtest.js && browserify ./src/benchtest.js -o browser/benchtest.js && uglifyjs browser/benchtest.js -o browser/benchtest.min.js && uglifyjs src/benchtest.js -o dist/benchtest.min.js

author: Simon Y. Blackwell <syblackwell@anywhichway.com> (http://www.github.com/anywhichway)
